eligibility.points: Full time undergraduate or graduate students during the 2022-23 school year.
Pursuing a degree in computer science, computer engineering, electrical engineering and computer science or software engineering.
Attending school in the US, India, UK, Serbia or Australia.
Minimum 3.5 GPA in countries that utilize GPA scoring.
Demonstrates strong leadership and communication skills.
Demonstrated record of co-curricular activity and community service
Participating in GSSoC is an opportunity to upgrade your Github Profile .
Enrich yourselves to learn,explore ,improve,enhance,build connections and become a team player to nourish your personality.
Don't miss a chance to get well-versed with Open-Source and essential tools like Git and Github under the supervision of excellent mentors.
The R D Sethna Scholarships are investments in young citizens, to empower the pursuit of their academic interests and careers.
The loan scholarships are granted on the basis of meritorious performance, to facilitate payment of tuition fees, academic material and related expenses for enhancing the education experience.

Applications are invited from students of all communities who are Indian citizens for grant of loan scholarships for scientific, technical, medical and other professional courses in India and overseas.
Who wish to pursue UG or PG courses.
Who have passed 12th, securing a minimum of 60% in 10th and 12th Std board exams
